resources.string: Love. Can know all the math in the \'verse but take a boat in the air that you don\'t love? She\'ll shake you off just as sure as a turn in the worlds. Love keeps her in the air when she oughtta fall down...tell you she\'s hurtin\' \'fore she keens...makes her a home.
Wash: "Psychic, though? That sounds like something out of science fiction."\nZoe: "We live in a space ship, dear."
Mal: I\'m just waiting to see if I pass out. Long story."
